definitions.definition: the ability to read and write

examples.text: a campaign to promote adult literacy
Most of the students here need help with **literacy and numeracy**.
All the children are tested in basic literacy.
Literacy rates are lower among people from the poorer income groups.
Standards of literacy are slowly rising in the 5–8 age group.

definitions.definition: knowledge or skills in a specific area

examples.text: We’re looking to hire an assistant with a high level of **digital literacy**.

wordOrigin: late 19th cent.: from literate, on the pattern of illiteracy.
